mapper.update:
update fenlei_baohu_main
ipci = #{ipci},
cci = #{cci},
cca = #{cca},
csets = #{csets},
CHUANTIME = #{finishTime},
STATE = #{state}
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select m.id,m.mingcheng,m.type,m.sqr,m.sqh,m.pdf_path,m.state,m.simpleclasscode,m.message,m.oraginization, m.cci,m.cca,m.csets,m.ipci,m.is_export as export, (to_date(jinantime,'yyyymmddhh24miss') - to_date('1970-01-01 08:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))*86400000 as jinantime, (to_date(chuantime,'yyyymmddhh24miss') - to_date('1970-01-01 08:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))*86400000 as chuantime, t.mainworker,t.assworker from FENLEI_BAOHU_MAIN m left join (select id,wm_concat(case when ipcmi is not null then worker end) as mainworker, wm_concat(case when ipcmi is null then worker end) as assworker from fenlei_baohu_result group by id)t on m.id=t.id where 1=1
AND m.id like concat(concat('%',#{id}),'%')
AND m.mingcheng like concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
AND m.oraginization like concat(concat('%',#{oraginization}),'%')
AND m.sqr like concat(concat('%',#{sqr}),'%')
AND m.sqh like concat(concat('%',#{sqh}),'%')
AND t.mainworker like concat(concat('%',#{worker}),'%') or t.assworker like concat(concat('%',#{worker}),'%')
AND m.state in ('1','7','9')
AND m.state = #{state}
AND m.chuantime between #{begintime} and #{endtime}
AND m.jinantime between #{enterBeginTime} and #{enterEndTime}

select m.id,m.mingcheng,m.type,m.sqr,m.sqh,m.pdf_path,m.state,m.simpleclasscode,m.message,m.oraginization, m.cci,m.cca,m.csets,m.ipci,m.is_export as export, (to_date(jinantime,'yyyymmddhh24miss') - to_date('1970-01-01 08:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))*86400000 as jinantime, (to_date(chuantime,'yyyymmddhh24miss') - to_date('1970-01-01 08:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))*86400000 as chuantime, t.mainworker,t.assworker from FENLEI_BAOHU_MAIN m left join (select id,wm_concat(case when ipcmi is not null then worker end) as mainworker, wm_concat(case when ipcmi is null then worker end) as assworker from fenlei_baohu_result group by id)t on m.id=t.id where 1=1
AND m.id like concat(concat('%',#{id}),'%')
AND m.mingcheng like concat(concat('%',#{mingcheng}),'%')
AND m.sqr like concat(concat('%',#{sqr}),'%')
select m.type from fenlei_baohu_main m where m.id=#{id}
select * from FENLEI_BAOHU_MAIN where (mingcheng is not null and sqr is not null) and (mingcheng is not null) and (sqr is not null)
select id from fenlei_baohu_main where mingcheng = #{mingcheng} and sqr = #{sqr} and id != #{exclude}
select id from fenlei_baohu_main where fuzzy_match_name = #{mingcheng} and sqr = #{sqr} and id != #{exclude}
select id from fenlei_baohu_main where mingcheng = #{mingcheng} and id != #{exclude}
select id from fenlei_baohu_main where fuzzy_match_name = #{mingcheng} and id != #{exclude}
select * from fenlei_baohu_main where mingcheng = #{mingcheng} and id != #{id} and sqr is not null
select * from fenlei_baohu_main where fuzzy_match_name = #{mingcheng} and id != #{id} and sqr is not null
mapper.update: update fenlei_baohu_main m set m.state=#{state},m.chuantime=#{chuantime} where m.id=#{id}
update fenlei_baohu_main m set m.ipci = #{ipci}, m.cci = #{cci}, m.cca = #{cca}, m.csets = #{csets} where m.id=#{id} and m.is_export = '0'
update fenlei_baohu_main set sqr = replace(sqr,'ï¼',',') where sqr like '%ï¼%'
update fenlei_baohu_main set sqr = replace(sqr,'ï¼',',') where sqr like '%ï¼%'
update fenlei_baohu_main set sqr = replace(sqr,';',',') where sqr like '%;%'
update fenlei_baohu_main set FUZZY_MATCH_RESULT = #{result} where id = #{id}
